participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i was born in the early 80 s. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i love new kids on the block.

participant_2.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper.

content.text: hi how are you today? i'm good.
what are your plans for the day? what do you do for work?
